797:       def create_node(parent, type, content)
798:         iter = if parent
799:           model.append(parent)
800:         else
801:           new_model = Editor.data2model(nil)
802:           toplevel.view_new_model(new_model)
803:           new_model.iter_first
804:         end
805:         iter.type, iter.content = type, content
806:         expand_collapse(parent) if parent
807:         iter
808:       end
